DistanceArray.H

00001 #ifndef DISTANCE_ARRAY_HEADER_INCLUDED
00002 #define DISTANCE_ARRAY_HEADER_INCLUDED
00003 
00004 
00005 namespace SimSite3D{
00006 namespace geometry{
00007 
00011 class DistanceArray{
00012 public:
00013   typedef std::vector< std::vector<const my_float_t *> > bin_vec;
00014   typedef bin_vec::const_iterator bin_vci;
00015 
00016   typedef std::multimap<bin_vci, const my_float_t*> bin2vert_mmap;
00017   typedef bin2vert_mmap::const_iterator bin2vert_mmci;
00018 
00021   DistanceArray()
00022   { init(); }
00023 
00024   DistanceArray(const my_float_t *positions, const uint num_pos,
00025                 const my_float_t bin_width, const my_float_t max_dist)
00026   {
00027     init();
00028     setup_grid(positions, num_pos, bin_width, max_dist);
00029   }
00030   
00031   ~DistanceArray() {;}
00032 
00033   void
00034   setup_grid(const my_float_t *positions, const uint num_pos, 
00035              const my_float_t bin_width, const my_float_t max_dist)
00036   {
00037     if(A_bins_are_setup){
00038       std::cerr << "Bins are already setup - cannot set them up again\n";
00039       return;
00040     }
00041     A_bin_width = bin_width;
00042     A_bin_width_inv = 1.0 / bin_width;
00043     A_max_dist = max_dist;
00044 
00045     my_float_t min_pos[3], max_pos[3];
00046     get_min_max_coords(positions, num_pos, min_pos, max_pos);
00047     determine_space(min_pos, max_pos, A_lower_corner, A_upper_corner, 
00048                     A_num_bins);
00049     populate_grid(positions, num_pos, A_max_dist, &A_bins);
00050 //    A_bins_for_moved_pts->resize(A_num_bins[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2]);
00051     A_bins_are_setup = true;
00052   }
00053 
00054   void 
00055   get_min_max_coords(const my_float_t *positions, const uint num_pos,
00056                      my_float_t *min_pos, my_float_t *max_pos)
00057   {
00058     std::copy(positions, positions + 3, min_pos);
00059     std::copy(positions, positions + 3, max_pos);
00060     const my_float_t *pos_end = positions + 3*num_pos;
00061     for(const my_float_t *pos = positions; pos < pos_end; pos += 3)
00062       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00063         if(max_pos[i] < pos[i]) max_pos[i] = pos[i];
00064         if(pos[i] < min_pos[i]) min_pos[i] = pos[i];
00065       }
00066   }
00067 
00068   void
00069   determine_space(const my_float_t *min_pos, const my_float_t *max_pos,
00070                   my_float_t *min_corner, my_float_t *max_corner, int *num_bins)
00071   {
00072     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00073       min_corner[i] = 
00074         A_bin_width * std::floor(min_pos[i] / A_bin_width) - 2*A_bin_width;
00075       max_corner[i] = 
00076         A_bin_width * std::floor(max_pos[i] / A_bin_width) + 2*A_bin_width;
00077       num_bins[i] = 
00078         static_cast<int>((max_corner[i] - min_corner[i]) / A_bin_width);
00079     }
00080   }
00081 
00082   void
00083   populate_grid(const my_float_t *positions, const uint num_pos,
00084                 const my_float_t max_dist,
00085                 std::vector< std::vector<const my_float_t*> > *bins)
00086   {
00087     // Would this be faster using dimension binning?
00088     //
00089     bins->resize(A_num_bins[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2]);
00090 
00091     std::vector< std::vector<const my_float_t*> >::iterator cbin = bins->begin();
00092     //std::vector<my_float_t*>::iterator cbin = bins->begin();
00093     const my_float_t *pos_end = positions + 3*num_pos;
00094     my_float_t min_pt[3], max_pt[3];
00095     min_pt[0] = A_lower_corner[0]; 
00096     max_pt[0] = A_lower_corner[0] + A_bin_width; 
00097     for(int i = 0; i < A_num_bins[0]; ++i){
00098       min_pt[1] = A_lower_corner[1]; 
00099       max_pt[1] = A_lower_corner[1] + A_bin_width; 
00100       for(int j = 0; j < A_num_bins[1]; ++j){
00101         min_pt[2] = A_lower_corner[2]; 
00102         max_pt[2] = A_lower_corner[2] + A_bin_width; 
00103         for(int k = 0; k < A_num_bins[2]; ++k){
00104           cbin->clear();
00105           for(const my_float_t *p = positions; p < pos_end; p += 3){
00106             if(min_pt[0] - max_dist <= p[0] &&
00107                p[0] <= max_pt[0] + max_dist &&
00108                min_pt[1] - max_dist <= p[1] &&
00109                p[1] <= max_pt[1] + max_dist &&
00110                min_pt[2] - max_dist <= p[2] &&
00111                p[2] <= max_pt[2] + max_dist)
00112             cbin->push_back(p);
00113           }
00114           min_pt[2] += A_bin_width; 
00115           max_pt[2] += A_bin_width; 
00116           ++cbin;
00117         }
00118         min_pt[1] += A_bin_width; 
00119         max_pt[1] += A_bin_width; 
00120       }
00121       min_pt[0] += A_bin_width; 
00122       max_pt[0] += A_bin_width; 
00123     }
00124   }
00125 
00126   bin_vci
00127   get_bin(const my_float_t *pt) const
00128   {
00129     // First check if point is outside of bin ranges
00130     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00131       if(pt[i] < A_lower_corner[i] || A_upper_corner[i] < pt[i])
00132         return A_bins.end();
00133 
00134     int idx[3];
00135     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00136       idx[i] = static_cast<int>(std::floor((pt[i] - A_lower_corner[i]) * 
00137                                            A_bin_width_inv)); 
00138     return A_bins.begin() + (idx[0] * A_num_bins[1] * A_num_bins[2] +
00139                              idx[1] * A_num_bins[2] + idx[2]);
00140   }
00141 
00142   void
00143   get_bins(const my_float_t *vert_begin, const uint num_vert, 
00144            bin2vert_mmap *pts_in_bins) const
00145   {
00146     const my_float_t *vert_end = vert_begin + 3*num_vert;
00147     for(const my_float_t *v = vert_begin; v < vert_end; v += 3){
00148       pts_in_bins->insert(std::pair<bin_vci, const my_float_t*>(get_bin(v), v));
00149     }  
00150   }
00151 
00153   inline bin_vci
00154   bins_end() const
00155   { return A_bins.end(); }
00156                 
00157 
00158 private:
00159   void
00160   init()
00161   {
00162     A_max_dist = my_float_max;
00163     A_bin_width = my_float_max;
00164     std::fill(A_upper_corner, A_upper_corner + 3, 0.0);
00165     std::fill(A_lower_corner, A_lower_corner + 3, 0.0);
00166     std::fill(A_num_bins, A_num_bins + 3, 0);
00167     A_bins_are_setup = false;
00168   }
00169 
00170   my_float_t A_max_dist;  
00171   my_float_t A_bin_width; 
00172   my_float_t A_bin_width_inv; 
00173   my_float_t A_upper_corner[3];
00174   my_float_t A_lower_corner[3];
00175   int A_num_bins[3];
00176   bin_vec A_bins;
00177 //  bin_vec A_bins_for_moved_pts;
00178   bool A_bins_are_setup;
00179   //std::vector<my_float_t *> A_bins;
00180 };
00181 } // end namespace geometry
00182 } // end namespace SimSite3D
00183 #endif
